title: Szechuan Chicken
directions: Heat oil in a wok on medium heat.
Add chicken and stir so that the pieces don`t stick together.
Fry until the chicken gives out a golden color.
Remove and drain on paper towel.
Leave about 1/4 cup in the wok.
Add Szechuan peppercorns and whole dried chille
Add chicken, peanuts, yellow bean paste, fried ground chili pepper with oil, whisky, salt and sugar.
Add spring onion in the end.
Place this on a serving platter.
ingredients: 2 cups chicken, cut into half inch pieces
9 whole dried chilis, chopped into 1/2" pieces
1/2 teaspoon ground Thai chili pepper, fried in 1 tablespoon oil
